description: Email inbox and outbox for sending, receiving, and managing emails.

tools.name: email_get_email_information_by_id
tools.description: Retrieves specific details of an email by its ID.

field.description: Specific field to return. Available fields: 'email_id', 'inbox/outbox', 'sender/recipient', 'subject', 'sent_datetime', 'body'

tools.name: email_search_emails
tools.description: Searches for emails matching the given query across subject, body, or sender fields. The function matches an email if all words in the query appear in any of these fields.

query.description: Search query, matching terms in subject, body, or sender/recipient fields

date_min.description: Lower date limit for the email's sent date (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

date_max.description: Upper date limit for the email's sent date (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD

page.description: Page number of results to return

tools.name: email_send_email
tools.description: Sends an email to the specified recipient.

tools.name: email_delete_email
tools.description: Deletes an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be deleted

tools.name: email_forward_email
tools.description: Forwards an email to the specified recipient.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be forwarded

tools.name: email_reply_email
tools.description: Replies to an email by its ID.

email_id.description: Unique ID of the email to be replied
